title: kAttaruL karuNA en guruparanE (sj)
sahitya:
kAttaruL karuNA en guruparanE tanjam enrE unadaDi paNindEn


1:  Attuma nAthA tOttiram ANDavA anjal enrE Arudal tandE
 caraNam 2    kAreuNya kartA karuNai purindE kenjum un sEi pajam tIrttE
 caraNam 3    yArum aTra Ezhai nAnE unaiyE enrum sharaNaDaindEnE
vEru uTra gatiyE illaiyE unadaDimaiyai AdarittANDE
 caraNam 4    vArum aNamaiyil en gurunAthanE nIyE en gati pughgaliDam vErillai
tArum aDaikkalam en EkaparanE unai nAn agalEn taruNam iduvE
pArum iraivanE nondE vandEn annai tandai nI arum tuNai nI
Aruyir talaivan nI manadu kanindu abhayam tandE viraindu vandE
 caraNam 5    tAparam enrE nambiyE vandEn dayavuDan anadagam vandE aruL tA
tA dinamunai tudittu pADavE tA migamigat-tA samayam iduvE tA
tA tA tarukaranE tArakanE nADiyE unnai tEDum ennaiyE
kUDiyE vandE kiTTavE ninraE dinam malaraDi tozhum marakatam mannA
